item.title: Nico add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "We are like butterflies who flutter for a day and think it is forever." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Nico add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Nico add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "The idea that God is an oversized white male with a flowing beard, who sits in the sky and tallies the fall of every sparrow is ludicrous. But if by 'God,' one means the set of physical laws that govern the universe, then clearly there is such a God. This God is emotionally unsatisfying... it does not make much sense to pray to the law of gravity." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Nico add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "We are a way for the cosmos to know itself." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Nico add a quote by Chuck Klosterman
item.description: "Every relationship is fundamentally a power struggle, and the individual in power is whoever likes the other person less." -- Chuck Klosterman

item.title: Nico add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Nico add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "The only regret I will have in dying is if it is not for love." -- Gabriel García Márquez
